text: Wa 'Idhā Kunta Fīhim Fa'aqamta Lahumu Aş-Şalāata Faltaqum Ţā'ifatun Minhum Ma`aka Wa Līa'khudhū 'Asliĥatahum Fa'idhā Sajadū Falyakūnū Min Warā'ikum Wa Lta'ti Ţā'ifatun 'Ukhrá Lam Yuşallū Falyuşallū Ma`aka Wa Līa'khudhū Ĥidhrahum Wa 'Asliĥatahum Wadda Al-Ladhīna Kafarū Law Taghfulūna `An 'Asliĥatikum Wa 'Amti`atikum Fayamīlūna `Alaykum Maylatan Wāĥidatan Wa Lā Junāĥa `Alaykum 'In Kāna Bikum 'Adháan Min Maţarin 'Aw Kuntum Marđá 'An Tađa`ū 'Asliĥatakum Wa Khudhū Ĥidhrakum 'Inna Allāha 'A`adda Lilkāfirīna `Adhābāan Muhīnāan
